website_summaries.verdict: The Asus ZenBook 3 mimics many of the best features of Apple's 12-inch MacBook, but in a Windows version with a more powerful processor.
pros: Powerful Core i7 processor in a slim, portable package with an excellent touchpad
A helpful USB-C mini-dock is included
cons: The 12.5-inch display is locked at 1,920x1,080 resolution, and it isn't a touchscreen
Battery life isn't as good as the MacBook
Other similarly configured systems cost less

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this laptop
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this laptop! It is so light which is perfect for me. I am a student and I already have to carry many papers and notebooks in my backpack so every extra pound really makes a difference. It's also quite powerful for its size! I don't think you could run high demand video games on it or anything, but all the basic stuff (word, powerpoint, internet, photoshop, etc.) functions perfectly and quickly. The SSD and RAM size is unbelievable for how small this laptop is. Bonus: the keyboard is backlit!!! So helpful in those dimly lit classrooms. This product is most certainly worth the price and I highly recommend it to anyone who needs it for basic purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Marie

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and Perfect to carry around. Powerful for a traditional use.
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop. Quick international delivery. The laptop is super light and thin! It runs smoothly even with many browsing tabs opened. The screen colors are beautiful. The battery lasts me around 6-7hrs with intensive browsing, music streaming plus a movie or similar. 2 negative sides: - the US bundle doesn't come with the USB-C hub (unlike other bundles I've seen online). - My space bar doesn't respond very well on the 1/3 right side. It is rather inconvenient for typing. I might have to get it fixed. I do recommend it for anyone looking for a laptop to carry around (students, professionals, travelers). PS: the grey color is darker than in most pictures (positive)
customer_reviews.author: Gilles Bergthold

customer_reviews.title: Best Zenbook Yet
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 256GB 8GB Silver version. This is yet the best Zenbook I've owned. It feels very rich and very fast. Excellent Work Asus!
customer_reviews.author: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: comfortable to type on
customer_reviews.text: Worth it. This computer is fast and holds up well. Very thin and light, I use this computer everywhere including in a car and it has worked well, comfortable to type on. the light up keyboard is nice. ITs portability and speed is the best quality
customer_reviews.author: ITEA

customer_reviews.title: So far, my favorite laptop!
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest laptop that I've owned! If there is one thing that I don't like is that it is hard to see the lighted keyboard in certain situations. Other than that, I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: SheCreatesTDC

customer_reviews.title: Looks premium, but it isn’t.
customer_reviews.text: At first, this laptop seemed really nice. I enjoyed the styling of it, despite the screen being so small. After about two years, the screen just started freezing and fading to black when opened. I started to open it up to try to fix or replace the screen, but instead got a new 15 inch laptop. I can’t recommend this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: great little laptop
customer_reviews.text: great little laptop. light and powerful. The fan is always on and if you really trying to listen to it you'll hear it but doing basic school work taking notes in class you shouldn't hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Roadster

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: There is an extremely annoying background static that makes my ears want to bleed. I emailed the seller directly and have gotten no response. I found a chrome book for half the price that I can pick up same day at Walmart with the same processing power so I will go get that and return this. Everything else is ok. The screen is kinda choppy and the keyboard is delayed
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: At the first month owning this laptop it was good i had some problems with wifi connectvity buy was ...
customer_reviews.text: At the first month owning this laptop it was good i had some problems with wifi connectvity buy was resolved when i reinstalled the wifi card drivers, then after another month the screen cracked for no apparent reason i never dropped it but it cracked somehow maybe the the other side of the hinge wasnt tough enough so i might have held the laptop with extra force without knowing and cracked it but thats not supposed to happen, and as of today the screen went all black in the middle for no reason
customer_reviews.author: Aziz

customer_reviews.title: MANY PROBLEMS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: TOTAL DISASTER! IT START GIVING ME PROBLEMS FROM THE EARLY BEGINNING. LETTERS LOOK WEIRD, IT APPEARED SUDDENLY A WHITE LINE ON THE SCREEN, A WHITE DOT WITHOUT DO NOTHING, NOW IT MAKES STRANGE SOUND IN THE SPEAKERS AND SCIENCE 2 DAYS IT DOES NOT EVEN CHARGES!!! SO DISAPPOINTED!!! I CONTACT AMAZON AND IT MAKES NOTHING TO FIX THIS, I LOOSED SO MUCH MONEY IN A COMPUTER THAT RUNS SO BADLY!!!! NOT RECOMMENDED AT ALL!!!! LOOKS GOOD AND RUNS SO BAD.
customer_reviews.author: Sai

customer_reviews.title: great battery for size
customer_reviews.text: Macbook style portability and sleekness, great battery for size, exactly what I need for my programming classes Would give it 5 stars if it weren't for the 3.5mm audio jack that has major issues. For example, everytime you want to listen to something on youtube you need to replug your headphones. The same issue happens by even clicking outside the window or pausing it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hinshaw

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Delicate, Short Warranty Period
customer_reviews.text: It is small and the battery last long. It is delicate and has only a 1-year warranty. The version I selected did not have USB ports or head phone ports, which was a pain in the butt. I won't buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Simonson

customer_reviews.title: Really love this laptop
customer_reviews.text: Used it more than 1 month , Really love this laptop. Everything is just great [ Finger scan , Sound , Battery ]. Need to buy more Usb type C hub for additional adapter. One comment for touchpad, This model has touchpad with no separated area of left click or right click. Everything can be done in same area. Unlike my old laptop which has separated area for scroll mouse and click. Need to change my habit a bit for this.
customer_reviews.author: maes99

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great ultra portable laptop. Make sure you get a USB-C dock that has charging capabilities as well.
customer_reviews.author: mike32090

customer_reviews.title: Ultraportable with ultra battery life
customer_reviews.text: I really like this ultraportable laptop. It has great battery life and the screen is great. A couple of minor issues to report: although it is advertised as including a couple of USB-C dongles, the little box in the package was empty and ASUS will not provide them; they told me to contact the seller. The monitor hinge is a little loose and doesn't allow me to place the angle of the monitor where I prefer it so I have to get used to the angle it works at...not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Raft

customer_reviews.title: Never buy this
customer_reviews.text: There is no warranty coverage, if you are from a country that is not the United States never buy a product by this means, they will not give you a guarantee, my product after 6 months of use began to fail and although I have a one year warranty nobody answered me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Battery. Otherwise good laptop. Fan always on ( not so loud though)
customer_reviews.text: just got this yesterday. Battery life is incredibly poor. Over night it drained the whole battery itself. Going to return it. after a year, the screen died
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There are no USB exits
customer_reviews.text: This computer is ver sleek design wieghts close to nothing and very easy to carry around. Only thing it’s so thin there are no USB exits which mean add a few dollars to get an external usb dock Other than that, it’s quick, beautiful display, very long battery life. I’m very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle S.R

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: after a year of careful use, the screen cable was torn. How is this possible on such a not-cheap model?
customer_reviews.author: Yaroslav

customer_reviews.title: I bought a Laptop and the battery doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It was really a problem for me since I live in Argentina
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Butler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Compact. Long battery life. Overall well built. But lacks a dongle in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and is absolutely beautiful looking
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is insanely fast! Perfect size and is absolutely beautiful looking. Even the box that it was in was beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this laptop, very light and thin, but the battery's life is running low so fast
customer_reviews.author: Aziz Hadi Prasetiya

customer_reviews.title: Overall great laptop, but some inconveniences
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is a great size and I love the usb-c port to connect all peripherals with one cable. On the flip side, the keyboard and touchpad are hard to use and I find myself often making mistakes. The touchpad has a hard press and I don't like that I can't but a fn lock on to use media buttons without hitting a combination of keys.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Better than tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Was initially looking for Windows tablets. But I needed a good keyboard quite often. This met my requirements. It is as slim, if not slimmer than most tablets. Light weight. USB-C charging. Smaller boarder too. Only wish they had matte screen. No touch screen is OK for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop...despite being bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop...a bit pricey but the thing works like a charm. Good quality...very thin but very usable
customer_reviews.author: Todd Gutschow

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This notebook has an excellent design and could be a great product, however Asus made a project of poor quality for the level and price of this notebook, it is visible that it is presenting a problem from 6 months, be it battery, screen or other. Mine with little more than 1 year had a problem with the battery and with 2 years had a problem on the screen, and Asus does not take any action on these frequent problems. I do not recommend buying, but if you want to take a risk, already know that within 1 to 2 years you will have problems and that it will be bad especially if you bought outside the United States.
customer_reviews.author: Heverton Luiz Dantas Souza

customer_reviews.title: Battery life could be a little better, but it is better than my past computers
customer_reviews.text: I have had many computers and this surpasses them all! it is so thin, lightweight, but very durable! Battery life could be a little better, but it is better than my past computers.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria  B.

customer_reviews.title: The best 12,5"......
customer_reviews.text: The best 12.5 "laptop we have had, weighs 800 grams, is very versatile, for its Core I5, Wifi AC is very fast, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos - Montevideo - Uruguay

customer_reviews.title: This is the best laptop. I usually don't use any external devices ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best laptop. I usually don't use any external devices so I'm fine with 1 USB c port.
customer_reviews.author: Krishna Chaitanya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful machine
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed in a laptop. I would recommend to do some Research before you buy it
customer_reviews.author: Mrcev

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Broken now! I just used for 1.5 years and I am not a heavy user. I recommend you “not“ to buy asus anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Chang chunchen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just amazing laptop.Value for money,really fast.lightweight and powerful instead. Highly recommended!!!!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect. However
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, this product is gorgeous. It's stylish, it's thin, it's light. About the appearance, it's perfect. However, the reasons I return this product are as follow: 1, the speaker is, I don't know if I can use dirty words, a shame. It hurts my ears. Even the Windows warning is sound broken. So as to me, the speaker is not acceptable even though I hardly use notebook to listen to musics. Other thought: the speaker on the new macbook is way better than this. 2, The fingerprint sensor is slow. The accuracy is bad.
customer_reviews.author: LIU Junyu

customer_reviews.title: A Big Dissapointment
customer_reviews.text: Computer requires a dongle if you want to connect thumb drives, SD card or HDMI cable. Keyboard is not back-lit. Characters on the keyboard are in a light colored font. The keys are also light colored, making it hard to see. The machine came loaded with "bloatware." The computer needed driver updates upon arrival. (Apparently this is why my HDMI interface does not work). Some of the bloatware wants me to subscribe to a driver update service. On top of all else, it uses Windows 10, which is another whole problem.
customer_reviews.author: DickB

customer_reviews.title: Wasted $1100
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get a chance a really use this laptop. It arrived with a shattered screen and then it got stolen so I pretty much threw $1100 out the window.
customer_reviews.author: Emma H

customer_reviews.title: I’ve never loved a laptop like I love this one.
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is lightweight, speedy, and a charm to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Ramsey

product_meta.title: ASUS ZenBook 3 UX390UA 12.5" Ultraportable Laptop Intel Core i5-7200U KabyLake 8GB RAM 256GB SSD with Fingerprint Sensor and Harman Karson Audio, Silver Gray
product_meta.description: Style:Zenbook OnlyZen book UX390UA-DH51-GR is crafted as the ultra portable laptop with its super slim design that is less than half an inch thin weighs only 2 lbs. Featuring Intel Core i5-7200U Kabyle, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD with fingerprint sensor and Harman Karson audio. *The actual transfer speed of USB 3. 0, 3. 1 (Gen 1 and 2), and/or Type-C will vary depending on many factors including the processing speed of the host device, file attributes and other factors related to system configuration and your operating environment.
feature_bullets: Crafted from premium aerospace-grade aluminum to create a body that is less than half an inch thin weighs only 2 lbs.
Latest 7th-generation kabylake Intel Core i5-7200U Processor 2.5 GHz (Turbo to 3.1 GHz) Cooled by copper-alloy heat pipe and liquid-crystal-polymer fan
12.5” IPS-type full HD Display with 178° viewing angles encased in corning Gorilla glass 4. Ultra-slim bezel at only 7.6mm
Windows 10 home. Built-in fingerprint sensor for enhanced security and one-touch login using Windows Hello feature
4x separate Harman kardon speakers and four-channel Amplifier for high-quality surround-sound onboard Audio.Please verify user manual for item instructions.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars77 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
